## getSchemaParts() function

Slices a schema into its composite parts. Useful for ruleset filtering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function getSchemaParts(input: string): Array<string> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | A schema string |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;string&gt; \| undefined

The vendor, schema name, major, minor and patch information of a schema string
